show.subtitle: Charlene Spretnak and her guests track the progress of the “Big Make-over,” the cultural and political Relational Shift that is occurring in all fields as a result of recent discoveries that life is far more dynamically interrelated than modern societies have realized.
show.title: All Together Now

title: Cities Taking the Initiative
content: Charlene Spretnak speaks with Benjamin Barber, author of If Mayors Ruled the World, about municipal governments acting... <!--more--> to address problems like carbon emissions, living wage, pre-K education even though their national and state governments do not; passage by Kandinsky about Moscow
